channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large amount of broken glass, 6th September
item.description:
Have reported this before but it is a lot worse. Loads of broken glass near the bar up from the Miller. All over pavement and in gutter. A human or animal could be badly injured. Please sort this
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Bath Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain outside Parkway completely blocked, 6th September
item.description:
The drain directly outside Parkway is completely blocked with thick mud and mulch. Causing significant flooding every time it rains. Recurring issue. Needs to be regularly cleared. Renders pavement completely unusable.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): West Drive, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement out no 15 Benhall Avenue, is starting to sink and the slabs are beginning to lift up causing a trip hazard. My be subsidence under slabs, 6th September
item.description:
Pavement out side no 15 Benhall Avenue

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Benhall Avenue, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unstable Flagstobne outside 76 Promenade, 6th September
item.description:
Outside 76 Promenade is an unstable flagstone. I have witnessed 3 falls within the last month on that very stone & a further atleast 5 in the last year.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 76, Promenade, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Idiots painting road signs on roundabout signage, 6th September
item.description:
Idiots painting road signs needs cleaning as makes it hard to see signs properly especially people learning to drive.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Evesham Road, Bishop's Cleeve

item.title: Graffiti on roundabout, 6th September
item.description:
Racism trying to be (badly) disguised as patriotism, but a red cross being painted on the roundabout. It's not only illegal via the highway code and vandalism etc. But painted as an act of aggression towards migrants that are welcome in the local area. It makes people feel not only deeply uncomfortable to see, but some may also feel afraid.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep and dangerous pothole in roundabout., 6th September
item.description:
Turning left from Ermin Street onto the roundabout.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Street, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge potholes causing huge issues with access, 5th September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 279, London Road, Cheltenham

item.title: School warning flashing light out, 5th September
item.description:
The ‘school zone ahead’ when flashing 20mph light does not work. It doesn’t ever light up at fixed times to warm drivers there is a school ahead.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Gretton, Tewkesbury

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 279, Cirencester Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Van left in road in dangerous position, 5th September
item.description:
There is a white ford transit van that has been left for a week now on Farm Lane just by the crossroads with Church Rd and Crippetts Lane. It takes up the entire LHS of the lane and is very dangerously positioned just off the crossroads so could cause an accident quite easily. I have reported it to the police who say it is a local authority matter. I don’t know if it has been abandoned or broken down but it is an insane place to have left it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Farm Lane, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water pipe leak, 5th September
item.description:
Water pipe under pavement is leaking . Water coming up through the pavement joins.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Carlyle Grove, Hesters Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Large tree growing on verge outside of 45 Courtiers Drive, 5th September
item.description:
Tree growing close and touching residence. Resident is requesting maintenance works to be carried out. Initial report sent in was sent to Tewkesbury Borough Council but TBC does not own/maintain this patch.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-3, Minetts Avenue, Bishop's Cleeve
